about.title: About
about.copyright:

All rights reserved.

description.bookshelf: Your bookshelf is empty. Start by adding your first book, audiobook, or comic to begin reading.
description.filter: No publications match this filter. Show your entire bookshelf to see all your titles.
description.kind: No publications match the selected type. Try showing all types to see more from your bookshelf.

remove.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove "{{ p1 }}"? This action cannot be undone.

return.confirmation: Are you sure you want to return "{{ p1 }}"? This action cannot be undone.

errors.missingPassphrase: A passphrase is required to open this publication. Contact your license provider to get the passphrase.
errors.invalidLicense: We couldn't validate the license for this publication. Please contact your license provider for assistance.
errors.statusCancelled: You cancelled access to this publication on {{ p1 }}. Contact your license provider if you'd like to restore access.
errors.statusReturned: You returned this publication on {{ p1 }}. Contact your library to borrow it again.
errors.statusExpiredStart: This publication will be available on {{ p1 }}.
errors.statusExpiredEnd: Your loan for this publication expired on {{ p1 }}. Contact your library to borrow it again.

statusRevoked.one: Access to this publication was revoked by your provider on {{ p1 }}. It was accessed on {{ count }} device. Contact your provider for more information.
statusRevoked.other: Access to this publication was revoked by your provider on {{ p1 }}. It was accessed on {{ count }} devices. Contact your provider for more information.

errors.renewFailed: Your publication could not be renewed. Contact your provider for assistance.
errors.invalidRenewalPeriod: This publication can't be renewed for the selected date. Please try a different date.
errors.returnFailed: Your publication could not be returned. Contact your provider for assistance.
errors.alreadyReturnedOrExpired: This publication has already been returned or has expired.
errors.copyForbidden: You've exceeded the maximum number of characters allowed for copying.

openBookshelf.title: Open Bookshelf
openBookshelf.description: Opens the app to your bookshelf.

error.title: Error
error.unexpected: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.corrupted: We couldn't open this content. The file might be corrupted or use a format we don't support. Please try with a different file.
errors.formatNotSupported: Unsupported file type. Please try a different file.
errors.insufficientSpace: There's not enough disk space to download or import this file. Please free up some space and try again.
errors.protocolNotSupported: This publication can't be opened from its current location. Try downloading it first or contact the book store for support.
errors.notFound: Couldn't open file. The file was not found.

errors.default: Something went wrong. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this content.
errors.offline: You're offline. Check your internet connection.
errors.malformedResponse: Cannot load this content. There's a problem with the server. Please try again later.
errors.methodNotSupported: The server doesn't support the required loading method.
errors.security: Secure connection failed. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
errors.unreachable: Could not connect to the server.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be signed in to access this content.
